title: Trump Appeals Court Ruling Allowing Release of Records to Jan. 6 Panel
sub_head: A House select committee is investigating events that led to the riot at the Capitol
body:
Lawyers for former President Donald Trump Thursday asked a federal appeals court in Washington to issue an emergency order that would prevent the Biden administration from turning over records related to his presidency to a House select committee investigating the Jan. 6 riot at the Capitol.
Mr. Trumpâ€™s lawyers asked the U.S. Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit for a temporary delay to allow them to argue the merits of the case before the appeals court.
